content: turn you will be working with right side facing you remember you are working from the top down soaker will be upside down as you work you will be working in the bind off stitches if knitted or into the previous single_crochet stitches if crocheted round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same stitch skip 1 st *seashell in next st skip 1 st single_crochet in next st skip 1 st * around join with slip_stitch round 2 chain 2 seashell in same single_crochet *single_crochet in next chain-2 space seashell in next single_crochet *around join with slip_stitch repeat this seashell pattern from round 2 working a seashell in each single_crochet and a single_crochet in each chain-2 space until you reach the top of the leg hole then you will work 1 increase round increase round continue to work seashell pattern with one change work 1 seashell in each single_crochet but in each chain-2 space work single_crochet seashell single_crochet this will give you the little flare at the bottom of the skirt resume working seashell pattern now you will have more seashells than before but work the pattern as you did in the rest of the skirt you do not want to keep increasing continue working this pattern until the skirt is the desired length fasten_off weave in ends i hope you enjoy your seashell lace skirtie pattern support is provided free of charge if you have any questions or think you have found an error please email patternsupport@daisyheadcreations com copyright info daisyhead creations connie stults 2009 this pattern is copyright protected the copyright does not transfer with sale you are buying a digital copy which may not be sold or given away either in printed or in digital form rights for use are only for the original buyer you may knit items from this pattern for personal use charity and gift giving you may also knit items from it in your own home for occasional sale meaning 5 items per year this is for wahm use not mass production please give credit to me in your listing by identifying the item as a daisyheadcreations pattern if you intend to sell more than 5 per year please contact me about purchasing a cottage license i know what it s like to be a wahm therefore the cottage license is good for a lifetime and the price is minimal this is only intended to honor the time and effort put into the creation of this pattern by my family and myself i am not responsible for the finished product sold by another wahm using this pattern copyright connie stults daisyhead creations http //www daisyheadcreations com/
